title: High-Yield Market More Immune Than Loans: Poli
description: Danielle Poli, assistant portfolio manager for global credit strategy at Oaktree Capital Management discusses stress in the credit space and gives her thoughts on CLOs. She speaks with Scarlet Fu on “Real Yield.” (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Danielle Poli, assistant portfolio manager for global credit strategy at Oaktree Capital Management discusses stress in the credit space and gives her thoughts on CLOs. She speaks with Scarlet Fu on “Real Yield.” (Source: Bloomberg)
